alert.note: Alert for Shelby (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 05 at 11:15PM CST until March 06 at 2:00AM CST by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 PM CST FOR CHRISTIAN...NORTHWESTERN SHELBY AND SOUTHWESTERN MACON COUNTIES... At 1114 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Taylorville, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Stonington, Assumption, Moweaqua and Macon. This includes Interstate 72 between mile markers 131 and 135. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
